title: Houndstooth Plaid and Pink Shoelaces

Look of the Week

Houndstooth Plaid and Pink Shoelaces

Published Jan. 13, 2025Updated Jan. 15, 2025

Antonio Francesco, 57, cut a dashing figure as he was walking to the Ralph Lauren store on Madison Avenue in Manhattan’s Upper East Side on Christmas Eve.

Mr. Francesco was born in Italy, but has lived in New York City for most of his life — more than 55 years, he said. Aubergine boots with pink laces completed his ensemble of herringbone pants and a herringbone plaid coat. The coat was from Ralph Lauren, he said, which is among his favorite places to shop.

“I consider many of the employees there to be friends,” Mr. Francesco added.
